attributes.action: drivers who reach up to 6 penalty points will be banned for life.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there so many horrible deaths and crime on the road. if drivers reach up to 6 penalty points on there licence then they should be automaticly banned from driveing for life. this way drivers might take more care and it would produce better drivers. no more light bans for a while or diqulifid for a year. make it a ban for life.
